title: Between American Typewriter and Rockwell
content:
Hello all.  
I’m looking to an alternative / similar face to American typewriter.  
as I like the way it feels handmade and a bit loose.  
But something bothers me about the serifs.  
But I don’t want anything as stiff as Rockwell but perhaps something in between?

It needs to ideally be a bit girly

Any ideas would be much appreciated

Cheers

Mr Brown

 [‹ Korean font embedded with Flash ?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201150847/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49721 "Go to previous forum topic") [Time signatures (music) in body text ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201150847/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49682 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Mr Brown

comments.content: I don’t know what your budget is, but Hoefler and Frere-Jones’ [_Archer_](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201150847/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100033) may fit the bill...

Mr Brown, any particular reason for posting this thread twice?

We’re not blind you know. Have patience. Also try: hitting your browser’s refresh button more frequently, thank you.

j a m e s

James, I think it was a mistake. Both threads were posted at the same time, so he might just have accidentally hit submit twice.

_«El futuro es una línea tan fina que apenas nos damos cuenta de pintarla nosotros mismos». (La Luz Oscura, por Javier Guerrero)_
I’ve noticed hiccups recently. Just have patience. No need to exaggerate.
You could also have a look at Nick Shinn’s [Bodoni Egyptian](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201150847/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/shinntype/bodoni_egyptian/).

Sorry folks. I’m just a little bit manic lately. Thanks for reeling me in. I’ll take a break from Typophile, eh? Best for all concerned.

Be nice to each other! And have a good thing to say.

j a m e s

I like the suggestions above. You could also try [Serifa](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201150847/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=serifa&x=0&y=0) or [Officina Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201150847/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/itc/itc_officina_serif/).
